title: Print, ca. 1740
inscribed: Signed in a scroll of the frame, bottom left, with letters in inverse direction: "scotin le jeune." Bottom margin: "A Paris ches Daumont rue de la Feronerie a l'Aigle d'Or." The privilege.
description: The escutcheon is composed on rocaille and architectural  motifs, of flowers and, on top, of the top of a stone arch. A music trophy is in a triangular panel in the bottom center. A horse, a dog, a rose, a group of buildings is shown through the arch. It rises from water, upon which a swan swims. At its near edge are birds.

tombstone.epitaph: Print, ca. 1740. Engraving with etching on paper. 1914-49-7.
